sentences.en: Do you feel hungry frequently ? Is orexis bloom a good thing?
sentences.cn: 最近时常感觉饿 吗 ?食欲旺盛是好事 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you feel hungry frequently? Is orexis bloom a good thing?

sentences.en: It is my orexis, without any aim.
sentences.cn: 那只是我心底的欲望，没有任何目的。
